name: Taoufik Hofmann
comment: Was offered a good deal for photography. Had some concerns regarding the service but Sam was great in helping me out and easing my concerns. So far I have had a positive experience and I feel comfortable with Sam!

name: Danielle Frisina
comment: You did some amazing job with not only our photos but our videos and in capturing the beautiful moments I will be able to relive for the rest of my life.Thank you for sharing our special day and helping us relive it through the images and videos!
